scripts.build: npm run build:minify && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:electron_win && npm run build:electron_linux && npm run build:electron_mac
scripts.devInstall: npm i --save-dev --arch=ia32 electron@8.4.0 && node installSubModules.js && echo "Everything is installed. You should be able to do npm run test to compile everything and launch."
scripts.devInstall:64: npm i --save-dev --arch=x64 electron@8.4.0 && node installSubModules.js && echo "Everything is installed. You should be able to do npm run test to compile everything and launch."
scripts.versions: echo Electron: && electron -v && echo Typescript: && tsc -v
